Run the light-filled Las Vegas Strip at night as you race to the sound to your favorite beats. The Rock-n-Roll Marathon was created to make running fun. have you ever tried running without a beat? Exactly. While Las Vegas may be the marquee run in the event the Rock-n-Roll Marathon travels the country and makes stop city like D.C., Phoenix, Dallas, Nashville, Seattle, Chicago, and more . If you love running and music, this event for you, as you xan choose to run a 5k, 10k, half marathon or full marathon.
